Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

3. PC71BM (Poly[cyclopentadienylene(ethylene-co-methylene) (95/5)]-alt-[4-(2-ethylhexyl)phenylene-2,6-diyl])

These are the materials used in the fabrication of the PSCs, and their properties are being discussed in the paragraph.
